Example.Title: Custom Mouse Tool with Camera
Example.Description: The example demonstrates the implementation of a custom mouse tool: the user can select between standard mouse handling (rotating) for a common Camera scene and a custom mouse tool. Latter draws a selection rectangle over the scene in a 2D style. The example prepares for handling the 2D coordinates after the mouse is released. Once the mouse is released it prints a message box with the 2D viewport coordinates of the selection rectangle.
